NSTU te ki kono medical centre ache?

responses: Here you can find the NSTU Medical center at this location: https://goo.gl/maps/w28nuzkz1gmpZXYWA

patterns: tell me about some facilities provided by medical center
tell me about some facilities provided by medical centre
ki ki subidha pawa jabe medical center e?
ki ki subidha pawa jabe medical centre e?
I am sick, help me
ami osustho
responses: The medical center of Noakhali science and technology university (NSTU) offers free experienced general practitioner and emergency medical care services to all members (students, teachers, officers, staff, also family members of the teachers, officers, staff) of the university community. The center provides service usually 8.30 am to 5.00 pm in working days but provide emergency services 24 hours. All members of the university get medicine from the medical center at free of cost .The center also has an ambulance, for 24 hours service.

responses: IIT is located in 2nd Floor of Library Building.

patterns: Where is the NSTU Central Mosque located?
Please tell me the Location of Central Mosque of NSTU
Nstu er central mosque ta kondike?
Nstu er mosjid ta kon jaigai ache?
responses: The central mosque of  NSTU is located on the way to the library building and front of the MEdical Center Nstu. See more details in map: https://vymaps.com/BD/Nstu-Central-Mosque-O8343189241/

patterns: Where is the NSTU Central Temple located?
Please tell me the Location of the Central Temple of NSTU
Nstu er central temple ta kondike?
Nstu er temple ta kon jaigai ache?
responses: The central temple of  NSTU is located on the way to the Bibi Khadija Hall or Monoshoroni Uddyan. See more details in map:https://www.google.com/maps/place/NSTU+Central+Temple/@22.7946896,91.0980933,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x3754afd4593f5885:0x159d54d3b3a13a9e!8m2!3d22.7946958!4d91.1002815

patterns: How many halls are in Nstu?
how many boys halls in nstu?
how many girls halls in nstu?
total halls number in NSTU
nstu te total koita hall ache?
cheleder jonno koita hall ache nstu te?
meyeder jonno koita hall ache nstu te?
when a student get hall seat as a fresher?
hall e seat kokhon pabo?
Hall e seat pete koto din somoi lagbe?
responses: NSTU have total 5 halls. Two boys hall, these are: 1.Basha Shahid Abdus Salam Hall, 2.Bir Muktijuddha Abdul Malek Ukil Hall. Three girls hall, these are: 1.Hazrat Bibi Khadiza Hall, 2.Jatir Pita Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Hall, 3.Bangamata Sheikh Fazilatunnessa Mujib Hall
Applications for vacant seats will be accepted from the hall subject to availability of seats.

Rafiqul Islam), 4.Jatir Pita Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Hall(Md.Majnur Rahman), 5.Bangamata Sheikh Fazilatunnessa Mujib Hall(Dr. Mohammad. Mohinuzzaman)

patterns: how many academic buildings are in NSTU?
Total academic buildings in NSTU
Academic Buildings Number
Nstu te total koita academic bhobon ache?
total academic bhoboner sonkha koto?
academic buildings
responses: There are 2 established Academic Buildings, namely Academic Building-1 and Academic Building-2, in this University. One academic building is now under construction, the most significant academic building in Bangladesh.

patterns: what is the activities of Auditorium?
I want to know about the auditorium of nstu?
auditorium niye jante chai
responses: Auditorium all activities:1.Cultural Programs of different Institutes, departments. 2.Course day celebration programs of different departments. 3.National Day Celebration programs. 4.ICT Job and Other Job fair. 5.Programming Contest Programs.
